title: (x) "Johnny's" kinda ugly brush script - LP Spring {Yves}
content:
Sorry for the drop shadow, its from the client and we need that sweet font, whatever it is.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20070811192034im_/http:/typophile.com/files/johnnysLogo.jpg)

 [‹ (x) "Shriners" serif face, NOT Proforma - Melior {Stephen}](http://web.archive.org/web/20070811192034/http:/typophile.com/node/19226 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Christian Book Store - Worcester Round {Yves} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070811192034/http:/typophile.com/node/19225 "Go to next forum topic")
author: nickfruhling

comments.content: I like Spring, but that squooshing, straight quote, and drop shadow really kill it.
